Name: Accelerated Healing
Desc: ½ Natural Recovery Healing Time (except Magic Recovery)

Name: Ambidexterity
Desc: No penalty when using off-hand

Name: Animal Cohort
Desc: Gain highly intelligent animal companion. Communicate with signs or whistles.

Name: Bane
Desc: +10 critical damage & No damage caps to 1 type of creature/race. May only be taken on 1st level unless GM/story grants.

Name: Battle Cry
Desc: Once per day +10 to OB & DB after shouting Battle Cry for 1 combat. Must spent 2 turns to perform. While shouting ½ BMR walk only.

Name: Combat Awareness
Desc: -30 Perception modifier during Combat (as free action) instead of -50

Name: Combat Reflexes
Desc: Extra 10d to initiative roll. Cannot be taken together with Lightning Reflexes. If so cancel previous.

Name: Commanding Demeanor
Desc: +20 to all Command rolls. Successful roll can grant allies a +10 to OB & DD until they get hit

Name: Destiny Sense
Desc: Spent a Fate Point to get important insight on main objective.

Name: Ear for Music
Desc: +25 to Singing & Play Instruments Skills

Name: Fair
Desc: +10 to Communication reactive and Communication structured categories,  and +15 to appearance (max 105). May only be taken on 1st Level.

Name: Faithful (Mayor)
Desc: Great Love and Devotion to Realm or Kingdom. When fighting to protect them +10 to parry and OB; +10 to RR Will against when related.

Name: Famous
Desc: +20 to communication reactive category when your fame can help you. Plus the drawbacks of being famous. -20 to mingling when undisguised

Name: General Weapon Master
Desc: +10 to all character weapon categories.

Name: Gifted teacher
Desc: you can teach your skills at half the learning rate to other players

Name: Gladden
Desc: Successful music roll make characters that listen recover hit points & exhaustion at ½ time. Must perform for at least one hour. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Golden Throat
Desc: +15 to any maneuver where verbally attempts to calm or persuade. (singing, public speaking, duping, trade, acting, etc.). May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Great Arm
Desc: x2 normal range for all thrown weapons.

Name: Hammerhands
Desc: All Brawling attacks are resolved on the Crush Critical Table rather than the Martial Arts Strikes Critical Table.

Name: Hardy
Desc: All negative bonuses to the characters actions gained through critical strikes are ½

Name: Hero of the Land
Desc: Fate points grant a bonus of ± 80 instead of the regular ± 50.

Name: Hoard (Lvl 1)
Desc: 1-50 sp. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Hoard (Lvl 2)
Desc: 51-500 sp. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Hoard (Lvl 3)
Desc: 501-5000sp. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Hoard (Lvl 4)
Desc: 5001-50000sp. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Hoard (Lvl 5)
Desc: 50001-500000sp. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Instinctive Defense
Desc: +10 to DB for all attacks. If aware of an incoming attack, may apply extra +10 to DB.

Name: Intensive Eyes
Desc: +10 to all skill where he interacts with other people (duping, trading, seduction, diplomacy). The other person must be close enough to be looked directly by him.

Name: Lucky (Minor)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 95-100.

Name: Lucky (Mayor)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 94-100.

Name: Lucky (Greater)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 93-100.

Name: Academic
Desc: your fumbles for lore skills are reduced to 01-02, you gain 20 skill ranks to give to Science Analytic, Socio Economics and Social Sciences skills . Additionally, you gain a +10 on the selected skills.

Name: Massive
Desc: you may wield a two handed weapon with one hand, encumbrance penalties are halved, you have a -20 to fighting in close spaces

Name: Miracle worker
Req: Intuition 80, Treat wounds 20R, Treat Ailment 20R, Diagnose 10R
Desc: you gain a +20 to Medicine category, also, all fate points spent in healing maneuvers grant an 80 instead of a 50

Name: Neutral Odor
Desc: The character’s body can mask the scent of any odor within 1.5m, wouldn't even leave an odor for any animals to find. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Outdoorsman
Desc: +15 to outdoors category

Name: Photographic Memory
Desc: Any 15 minutes or more studies will be placed into his memory. This also grants a +10 to all Science Analytic, Socio Economics and Social Sciences categories

Name: Regeneration
Desc: Ability to negate permanent damage from all but fatal wounds. Recovery rate for non-fatal injuries is ½.

Name: Rent (Lvl 1)
Desc: 1-10 sp monthly rent for some business the character is involved.

Name: Rent (Lvl 2)
Desc: 11-100 sp monthly rent for some business the character is involved.

Name: Rent (Lvl 3)
Desc: 11-100 gp monthly rent for some business the character is involved.

Name: Rent (Lvl 4)
Desc: 101-1000 gp monthly rent for some business the character is involved.

Name: Resilient
Desc: Any bleeding wounds (wounds giving hits per round) that the character receives have their rates ½ (round down).

Name: Resistance -all (Mayor)
Desc: +10 bonus to all Resistance Rolls. Cannot be taken withother tlents that affect Resistance

Name: Resistance -all (Greater)
Desc: +20 bonus to all Resistance Rolls. Cannot be taken withother tlents that affect Resistance

Name: Sense Magic
Desc: To detect active magic, must roll general Perception (with -20 mod). May concentrate on any spot (max 1.5m²) within 300m. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Sponsor (Mayor)
Desc: A powerful person knows you and considers you worthy of respect (eg. Queen, General, Governor). Grants you aid if able. May only be taken on 1st level.

Name: Stat Bonus (Mayor)
Desc: +5 bonus to any stat.(Spec Column)

Name: Stat Bonus (Greater)
Desc: +8 bonus to any stat.(Spec Column)

Name: Subtle
Desc: +10 bonus on all his subterfuge active skills.

Name: Sureshot
Desc: ½ range increment penalties (from -10 to -5). May be taken multiple times, once for misile and one for thrown

Name: Tolerance
Desc: Allow to take 150% hits loss before falling unconscious. Does not modified death limit hit points.

Name: Treacherous
Desc: you gain a +20 to your communication reactive skills when you are not beign honest

Name: Warrior Born
Desc: fate points spent on combat actions give +80 instead of the usual +50.

Name: Waterdancer
Desc: Ag stat bonus x2 added to DB (on top of Qu bonus) if character passes an acrobatics maneuver. Character has to be using no more than a Soft Leather armor and a buckler. No two handed weapon allowed.

Name: Natural Commander
Desc: +10 to warfare category

Name: Animal Empathy
Desc: +20 Maneuvers with 1 type of animal. Communicate empathically if spent 1 month with specific being (Range: 30cm per month)

Name: Artistic
Desc: +10 Performance category

Name: Athletic
Desc: +10 to Skills Climbing, Jumping, Acrobatics, Swimming

Name: Blazing Speed
Desc: +5' (1.5 m.) to BMR. May only be taken on 1st level

Name: Charismatic
Desc: +10 to skills seduction, trade, public speaking and convince

Name: Climber
Desc: +20 to all Climbing maneuvers

Name: Disarm Skill
Desc: +30 to Disarm Foe attempts.

Name: Diver
Desc: +20 to Swimming Skill

Name: Dodge
Desc: +20 to dodging maneuvers

Name: Drowsing (Lesser)
Desc: This is the ability of the character to manage to properly rest while wearing Soft Leather armor without any penalties

Name: Drowsing (Minor)
Desc: This is the ability of the character to manage to properly rest while wearing Rigid Leather armor without any penalties

Name: Drowsing (Mayor)
Desc: This is the ability of the character to manage to properly rest while wearing Chainmail armor without any penalties

Name: Drowsing (Greater)
Desc: This is the ability of the character to manage to properly rest while wearing Plate & Chain armor without any penalties

Name: Drowsing (Uncanny)
Desc: This is the ability of the character to manage to properly rest while wearing Full Plate armor without any penalties

Name: Trap Specialist
Desc: +15 bonus to Disarm Locks & Traps

Name: Enhance Senses
Desc: +10 to Perception active and passive rolls.

Name: Extremely Nimble
Desc: +10 to Stalking & Hiding, contorsions and Acrobatics skills

Name: Face in the crowd
Req: Presence must be less than or equal to 70
Desc: +20 to mingle

Name: Favor of Fortune
Desc: Once per gaming session you may re-roll any dice you rolled. You may buy this talent many times.

Name: Favor of the nobles
Desc: if you are lowborn and without a title, you gain a +10 to communication rolls against anyone of higher status

Name: Favor of the small folk
Desc: if you are a noble or knight you get a +10 to communication rolls against anyone of lower status

Name: Favorite Library (Minor)
Desc: +20 bonus to all your lore Science when looking for information in your library; may be a small Lord or merchant library. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Favorite Library (Mayor)
Desc: +40 bonus to all your science skills when looking for information in your library; may be a Region Lord or Scholar merchant library. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Fluent
Desc: +20 extra ranks to distribute between language skills, written and spoken. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Geographical Awareness
Desc: +10 to navigation and cartography.

Name: Guttersnipe
Desc: pickpockets fumble reduced to 01-02

Name: Hardmarch
Desc: Travel at normal speeds without penalty on chosen terrain. This talent may be taken many times.

Name: Heirloom
Desc: you inherit an item of superior quiality of your choice. For example a +15 sword

Name: Herbalist
Desc: +5 to cooking, foraging, herbcraft and poison lore.

Name: Heroic Resistance
Desc: Successful resistance stamina bonus maneuver uses the granted bonus to negate the penalties for low hit points.

Name: High Jumper
Desc: +10 to jumping skill.

Name: Internal Clock
Desc: successful perception maneuver can let you know exactly the elapsed time.

Name: Internal Sense
Desc: +20 on stamina rolls to resist stunning. Stunned maneuvering penalties are reduced to -30 instead of -50.

Name: Judge of Weaponry
Desc: You can’t be tricked concerning to a weapon's quality, you have a special +35 to appraisal (weapons).

Name: Lie Perception
Desc: +20 to lie perception maneuvers. Distance may hinder your percetion

Name: Light Sleeper
Desc: You can make a perception passive roll at -50 to wake from sleep if an unknown danger approaches.

Name: Lightning Reflexes
Desc: +5 to initiative roll. Cannot be taken together with Combat Reflexes. If so cancel previous.

Name: Lucky Dramatic (Lesser)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 95-100 and low open ended roll range is 01-06.

Name: Lucky Dramatic (Minor)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 94-100 and low open ended roll range is 01-07.

Name: Lucky Dramatic (Mayor)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 93-100 and low open ended roll range is 01-08.

Name: Lucky Dramatic (Greater)
Desc: High open ended roll range is 92-100 and low open ended roll range is 01-09.

Name: Manual Deftness
Desc: +10 to sleight of hand & disarm locks and traps.

Name: Master Craftsman
Desc: +10 bonus to all crafting skills and +35 to a particular one.

Name: Missile Deflection
Desc: When Missile Deflection Combat Action is used +1 to DB for every 2 points put into the parry (instead of every 5 points).

Name: Natural Facility with Armor
Desc: +10 to armor skill, reduces the minimum armor penalty by 5

Name: Natural Rider
Desc: +15 Animals category skills when related to horses

Name: Night Training
Desc: All penalties caused by low-light conditions or total darkness are ½.

Name: Nimble Skeleton
Desc: +25 to contortions.

Name: Peripherical Vision
Desc: -5 penalty for flanking attacks, -15 for rear attacks. However, appearance roll is determined on a 2d10, instead of 1d100. May only be taken at 1st level.

Name: Physick
Desc: +10 bonus to the medicine category

Name: Portage Skills
Desc: The character can one more extra slot without penalty

Name: Quick Calculator
Desc: +25 to trading.

Name: Quick Draw
Desc: Weapon is drawn as a free action.

Name: Quiet Stride
Desc: +20 to Stalking&Hiding maneuvers.

Name: Reduced Sleep Requirement
Desc: ½ required sleep time.

Name: Refuge
Desc: Cave, small country house, safe house in a city. No special defenses or secret doors, just a small place to rest or hide. This talent may be taken many times.

Name: Resistance Stamina (Minor)
Desc: +10 bonus to all Stamina-based Resistance Rolls. Cannot be taken withother tlents that affect Resistance

Name: Resistance Stamina (Mayor)
Desc: +20 bonus to all Stamina-based Resistance Rolls. Cannot be taken withother tlents that affect Resistance

Name: Resistance Will (Minor)
Desc: +10 bonus to all Will-based Resistance Rolls. Cannot be taken withother tlents that affect Resistance

Name: Resistance Will (Mayor)
Desc: +20 bonus to all Will-based Resistance Rolls. Cannot be taken withother tlents that affect Resistance

Name: Ropecraft
Desc: +25 bonus to the ropemastery skill.

Name: Scholar
Desc: +10 bonus to Science Analytic, Socio Economics and Social Sciences skills

Name: Sea Legs
Desc: No penalties when performing actions on a Ship, even if passing through a storm.

Name: Shield Attack
Desc: +25 to his shield attacks.

Name: Shield Training
Desc: Enables the Trained bonus on any shield

Name: Skill Specialization
Desc: +10 bonus to a single skill. This Talent may be taken no more than three times, for a different skill each time. (free Addon)

Name: Speed Loader (Bows)
Desc: May reload and fire every other round. This Talent may be taken multiple times for a different type of missile weapon each time.

Name: Speed Loader (Crossbows)
Desc: Reload and fire time is ½ (round up). This Talent may be taken multiple times for a different type of missile weapon each time.

Name: Speed Loader (Slings)
Desc: May reload and fire every other round. This Talent may be taken multiple times for a different type of missile weapon each time.

Name: Speed Reading
Desc: The character can read up to ten pages per minute.

Name: Sponsor (Minor)
Desc: A powerful person knows you and considers you worthy of respect (eg. Faramir). Grants you aid if able. May only be taken on 1st level.

Name: Stability Sense
Desc: Stunned rounds reduce by 1 round. If a strike results in only one round of stun, then it has no effect.

Name: Stat Bonus (Lesser)
Desc: +1 bonus to any stat. (Spec Column)

Name: Stat Bonus (Minor)
Desc: +3 bonus to any stat.(Spec Column)

Name: Steel Grip
Desc: Resist weapon disarming with a +20 bonus, all his fumble ranges for melee weapons are reduced by 1. No fumble range can go below 1.

Name: Urbanite
Desc: you have a +10 in the urban category and your are able to dig information in half the time.

Name: Strong Lungs
Desc: Allowed to hold his breath for 10 seconds plus 1 minute per Constitution bonus (minimum of 10 seconds).

Name: Survival Instinct
Desc: +20 DB to full parry combat action, instead of +10.

Name: Swift Dresser
Desc: 75% time to put on armor. Allowed to develop swift dressing skill. Skill may lower dressing time to a minimum of 25%.

Name: Taletelling
Desc: +25 to storytelling and poetry skills

Name: Tireless
Desc: ½ penalties for not sleeping or eating.

Name: Toughness
Desc: +20 to endurance skill.

Name: Travel Sense
Desc: Character always knows where the north is. +20 to navigation

Name: Treacherous Blow
Desc: +10 to Dirty Fighting maneuver

Name: Walk Without Trace
Desc: foes have a -40 penalty to track you on a certain type of terrain. Talent may be taken multiple times, one foe every type of terrain.

Name: Weapon Control
Desc: Character's main weapon reduces fumble range by -2, all other weapon by -1, to a minimum of 1.

Name: Mummer
Desc: you have to roll a difficult performance maneuver, if you succeed you earn 1d10 sp, for every other degree of success you earn 2 aditional coins.

Name: Potential Stat (Lesser)
Desc: Increase potential stat limit of stat under 61 by 1d10+5. Talent can be taken multiple times.

Name: Potential Stat (Minor)
Desc: Increase potential stat limit of stat under 71 by 1d10+5 or stat under 81 by 1d6+4. Talent can be taken multiple times.

Name: Potential Stat (Mayor)
Desc: Increase potential stat limit of stat under 95 by 1d6+4. Talent can be taken up to 3 times.

Name: Potential Stat (Greater)
Desc: Increase potential stat limit of stat above 92 by 1d6+4. Talent can be taken up to 3 times for Stats under 95 or up to 2 times for Stats 96 and above.

Name: Preferred Weapon
Desc: In one weapon group (ex. Short blades) you give one weapon a special +10 bonus, but a -15 to all the other weapons in that category.

Name: Racial Training
Desc: +10 bonus to 4 adolescence skills, no weapon skill may be favored by this talent.
